attributes.action: ban the mosquito- anti teen- weapons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These mosquito devices are a form of discrimination.

It has attracted the attention of the Children's Commissioner and several civil rights groups.

These devices hurt babies, todlers and innocent young people and can be used to indiscriminately attack young people even when they are not causing a problem.

They also demonise young people, and create more social tension than they solve.

If this device targeted any other group within society, it would be banned. Therefore, it is completely unfair to install these devices against young people.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the mosquito- anti teen- weapons."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20222


Prime Minister's Office
